Name: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Description: A shared universe of superhero films and TV shows based on Marvel Comics.

Name: DC Extended Universe
Description: A shared universe of superhero films based on DC Comics.

Name: Star Wars
Description: A fictional universe created by George Lucas, known for its space opera franchise.

Name: Harry Potter
Description: A fantasy universe created by J.K. Rowling, featuring the Wizarding World.

Name: The Lord of the Rings
Description: A high fantasy universe created by J.R.R. Tolkien, known for its epic novels and film adaptations.

Name: The Matrix
Description: A science fiction universe created by The Wachowskis, known for its groundbreaking film series.

Name: Jurassic Park
Description: A sci-fi adventure universe featuring genetically resurrected dinosaurs.

Name: James Bond
Description: A spy film universe featuring the iconic character James Bond.

Name: Fast & Furious
Description: An action-packed universe centered around illegal street racing and heists.

Name: Transformers
Description: A science fiction universe featuring sentient robots that can transform into vehicles and other objects.

Name: X-Men
Description: A superhero universe based on the Marvel Comics' mutant characters known as X-Men.

Name: The Witcher
Description: A fantasy universe created by Andrzej Sapkowski, known for its books, video games, and TV series.

Name: Avatar
Description: A science fiction universe created by James Cameron, featuring the planet Pandora.
